bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Robert S. Gill, June 18, 1941

div1.p: Hench thanks Gill for loaning him the Dominguez manuscript on Finlay, and would like to be informed when a publication decision is made.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Robert S. Gill, June 18, 1941
div1.opener:
June 18, 1941
Mr. Robert S. Gill
The Williams and Wilkins Company
Mt. Royal and Guilford Avenues
Baltimore, Maryland
My dear Mr. Gill:
div1.p:
I appreciate very much indeed your lending to me
your manuscript of Dr. Dominguez' manuscript on the life
and work of Dr. Finlay. I shall try to review this in
detail but it may take some weeks and I would appreciate
your indulgence in this matter.

I should appreciate also knowing when you have
made a decision as to the publication of this book. I
know in Cuba they are very anxious to have it published
in English.
div1.closer: Very truly yours, P. S. Hench, M. D. psh:ds
